name: [Measurement sensors] gravEnabled - gyroEnabled - accEnabled - rotationEnabled - movementDetectionEnabled
description:
These properties affects the measurement sensors

- *gravEnabled*: When enabled and supported by the device, the measurement result will hold gravitational data.
- *gyroEnabled*: When enabled and supported by the device, the measurement result will hold gyroscope data.
- *accEnabled*: When enabled and supported by the device, the measurement result will hold accelerometer data.
- *rotationEnabled*: When enabled and supported by the device, the measurement result will hold rotational data.
- *movementDetectionEnabled*: When enabled the `onMovementDetected` event will be thrown when movement is detected.The detection will trigger when the movement vector is lower than 6 or higher than 14.
